content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, I appreciate your interest in my apartment. Based on our discussion, I believe we can come to an agreement on the rental price. May I ask what your budget is for a monthly rental in New York?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 2000 Euros per month.

I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price while still being able to live comfortably. I am willing to negotiate and be flexible with the rental price.

I would like to make sure that the apartment is in good condition and that it meets my needs before agreeing to the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Understood, Maria. I understand that you are looking for the lowest possible price while still being able to live comfortably. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and be flexible.

Based on our discussion, I believe we can agree on a rental price of 1800 Euros per month. This price takes into account the size and location of the apartment, as well as the current market rates in New York.

Please let me know if you have any concerns or if you would like to see the apartment before signing the lease agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1800 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding and flexibility.

I would like to sign the lease agreement as soon as possible. Can you provide me with the necessary documents and information to do so?

Also, would you like me to pay the first month's rent and security deposit upfront, or would you prefer that I pay them in installments?

Thank you again for your help.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Great, Maria. I'm glad you are willing to agree to the rental price of 1800 Euros per month.

To proceed with the lease agreement, I will need to provide you with the necessary documents and information. Once you have received these documents, you can sign the lease agreement and pay the first month's rent and security deposit.

I would prefer that you pay the first month's rent and security deposit upfront, as this helps to ensure that I have a steady stream of income from the rental. However, if you prefer to pay these amounts in installments, we can discuss that option further.

Please let me know if you have any additional questions or concerns. I'm happy to help you with this process.
name: Heinrich Heine
